column4: I set the visual effect at extra but when Check back its back to none.Why its happens?
something is stopping it from using extra. probably a bad graphics driver or too old graphics card.
how old is your computer?
How do I figure it out.My laptop is new and using NVIDIA grapic
you probably need a better driver.
go to System > Administration > Hardware drivers. does it recommend a driver there?
Is says recommand
yes
I don't know about your link there, doesn't look reliable.
that is the graphic driver in hardware driver when i enable it
I have enable it
Okay if everything looks good then close Hardware Drivers and then try setting it to high effects
reboot your computer first
reboot before
then after your computer restarts enable extra effects
Spanglish_7776: how do I restart the graphical server after activating the driver?
if you reboot it will restart the graphical server.
so it still won't stay on extra?
yes.Its wont stay
9.04 is still 2 versions old. the latest is 10.04
